item.description:
Please note that this event is ongoing. I simply selected a date/time b/c Meetup requires that we select a date. Please email me or Eva to learn more.

General Assembly, a venture-backed, NYC-based education start up that offers courses in technology, design, and business recently opened up a campus in Cambridge! They have been featured in : TechCrunch | Fast Company | FT | NYTimes | Fortune | BBC | Forbes. General Assembly is offering our members 15% off classes and workshops. For a list of classes please click here. Please use the discount code: BVO.


General Assembly is looking for instructors to teach classes in the areas of technology, business, and design (i.e:Intro to Adwords, Intro to Ruby on Rails, Basics of Business Blogging). Boston Volunteers will receive 50% of the ticket sales from classes that are taught by our own volunteers! If you are interested in helping out please email Eva at eva@generalassemb.ly.

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to Deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

P.P.S. Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers: https://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers

P.P.S. Many Boston Volunteers are friending our friend, the popular Paulette.
Who is Paulette: http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Teaching opportunities to help local Bostonians.
